g_bMixedRealityCockpitCoverEnabled: Setting this will default the Mixed Reality Cockpit Cover on (1) or off (0). Can still be toggled in game.
g_bVRNoPresent: This will not display the companion window in VR (only HMD will show image in 3d).
g_bVRParallelRenderThread: Enable multi-threaded rendering for VR (1: higher throughput; 0: lower latency).
g_bVRPredictFutureHeadMatrices: Predict future head matrices for SteamVR. Only works with g_bVRParallelRenderThread enabled.
g_fVRZoom: Factor to reduce field-of-view in VR, for LookCloser callback.
g_nVRHMCSEYE: HMCS renders, 0 right eye, 1 left eye, -1 both eyes.
g_nVRHMD: Enables VR - 0: no VR; 1: SteamVR; 2: OpenXR.  (overridden by -vr, -xr or -novr command line options)
